page.title: 20An Alton School
page.content:
Children from the ages of 7 to 11 attend our school. We have a main building and a smaller, newer, module building. We have 9 classrooms in use, with about 30 children in each class. Three other rooms are used for a library and resources area, for music, and for television. We have two playgrounds and two large fields. In the winter the boys play football and the girls play netball, in the summer the boys play cricket and the girls play rounders. In the last 12 years we have planted many young trees which will one day give shade to the children here.
These pages were written, edited and typed by fourth year children of Anstey County Junior School, Alton, and their teachers.
